contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|cataclysm|cataclysmic}} The term '''cataclysm''' (from the Greek ''kataklysmos'', to 'wash down' (''kluzein'' "wash" + ''kata'' "down") may refer to: *[[Deluge (mythology)]] *a hypothetical [[Risks to civilization, humans, and planet Earth|Doomsday event]] *any catastrophic [[List of geological phenomena|geological phenomenon]] **[[volcanic eruption]] **[[earthquake]], the result of a sudden release of energy in the Earth's crust that creates seismic waves *more generally, any large-scale [[disaster]] *[[World_of_Warcraft:_Cataclysm|World of Warcraft: Cataclysm]], the third [[expansion pack]] of [[Blizzard Entertainment|Blizzard Entertainment's]] [[World of Warcraft]] == See also == *[[ekpyrosis]] (conflagration) *[[eschatology]] {{Disambiguation}} [[Category:Septuagint words and phrases]] [[cs:Kataklyzma]] [[de:Kataklysmus]] [[es:Cataclismo]] [[pt:Cataclismo]] [[ru:Катаклизм]] [[sh:Kataklizma]] [[fi:Kataklysmi]]
